data.text:
Online Progress Tracking Map

Disclaimer: The data on the webmap will be updated as progress is reported

THE TOWN OF JAMES ISLAND BRANTLEY PARK GROUNDBREAKING

“This park is a great step forward in our joint efforts to reimagine Folly Road to a more walkable and green corridor, as well as our efforts to improve and protect the water quality of James Island Creek.” Mayor Woolsey, November 1, 2021

For questions about the Rethink Folly Road Plan, please contact:

Flannery Antinoro, Town of James Island | info@jamesislandsc.us
